programme.desc: Do It Yourself: Phil's feeling pretty good about himself after a successful DIY project. So he convinces Jay to invest in a property that he's always wanted to develop. (S8 Ep13) [S]

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Heavy Is the Head: Will Phil have to rethink his property dream? And Cam has to go to hospital but refuses to have an MRI scan because of a traumatic childhood incident in a well. (S8 Ep14) [S]

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Finding Fizbo: Cam is enraged when he sees a clip of someone desecrating his beloved Fizbo costume, so he sets out on a quest to restore Fizbo's good name. (S8 Ep15) [S]

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: (2008) Animated family sequel. Alex the lion and friends get stranded in continental Africa, where they learn some harsh lessons. With the voices of Ben Stiller and Chris Rock. [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Conjugal Conjecture: The gang face an awkward morning after Sheldon's mother and Leonard's father share an evening together. Penny's family arrive in town. (S10 Ep1) [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Military Miniaturization: Howard has a meeting with Air Force representative Colonel Williams about the gyroscope he invented with Leonard and Sheldon. (S10 Ep2) [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Dependence Transcendence: Tensions rise when the guys struggle to complete their Air Force project on time and are forced to work around the clock. (S10 Ep3) [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cohabitation Experimentation: When Amy's flat is flooded, she has to move out while it is being repaired and proposes a 'cohabitation experiment' with Sheldon. (S10 Ep4) [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hot Tub Contamination: Leonard and Penny intervene when Sheldon and Amy have an argument. Howard and Bernadette are disturbed by unexpected guests. (S10 Ep5/24) [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fetal Kick Catalyst: Penny meets her fans at a comic book convention. Sheldon and Amy host brunch at Penny's flat. Howard makes an impulsive purchase. (S10 Ep6/24) [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Veracity Elasticity: Leonard is upset when he finds out that Penny has been moving his collectables out of Sheldon's old room and into storage behind his back. (S10 Ep7/24) [AD,S]

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Brain Bowl Incubation: Sheldon tries to convince Amy that they should procreate. Raj feels embarrassed about what the new woman in his life does for a living. (S10 Ep8/24) [AD,S]

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien. [AD,S]

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Celebrity favourites and some of Britain's best-loved LGBTQ+ personalities hit the sofa for a Pride anniversary special, including Rylan, Clare Balding, Scott Mills and Paul Sinha. (S4 Ep4) [AD,S]

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The top TV includes Jamie's £1 Wonders, Married at First Sight Australia, Only Connect, Sex Actually with Alice Levine, Fall and Naked and Afraid. (S21 Ep3) [AD,S]

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: The Buildings That Fought Hitler
